JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Joint Postdoctoral Position in Single-cell Biology in ATLAS
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Center for Functional Genomics and Tissue Plasticity (ATLAS) hereby announces an open postdoc position in the field of computational and experimental aspects of single-cell biology. 

The position is dually affiliated with leading groups in the field: the Mandrup Group and the Madsen Group in ATLAS. The motivated and dedicated candidate will spearhead a project on ambient RNA contamination of single-cell and single-nucleus samples, and generate the necessary experimental data and computational methods to better distinguish between bona fide cell- or nucleus-containing droplets and ambient RNA-loaded droplets.

The experimental work will be carried out in the Functional Genomics & Metabolism Research Unit, at the Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, and the computational part in the Section for Data Science and Statistics at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, SDU. By becoming a postdoc in ATLAS, the candidate also becomes part of a great, interdisciplinary network.

Deadline: 11 May 2022

Please see the full call, including how to apply, on www.sdu.dk.
